name: Boxing Day
description:
Welcome to scam-a-zon the brand new packing company on the block and any similarity  to any currently existing  shipment companies is completely coincidental

after getting the job you have to stack as many boxes as you can into your crate from pipes on the ceiling, when the buttons beneath them are  black you can press them  and get a box.

A /<- Left

D/-> Right

E press button

also, massive shout out to Kaffe and Lex  for helping me with a coding issue that halted me in my tracks, providing answers to my endless questions, and providing emotional support when I was close to quitting thank you guys so much!
